name: Monsters Island (fish.wonder.land)
description:
== Intro ==

Run through the Monsters Island and shoot up all your enemies!

This is a top-down shooter game where players run through a linear map, shooting up encountered enemies and fighting against a final boss. Along the path, players can find hidden position to recover their health and get fellows that help them in battle.

== Control ==

Move: W/A/S/D

Shoot: Right Mouse Click
